content.question: What, if anything, is printed as a result of executing each of the code segments?

choices.label: Code segment I prints the price of  myItem, and code segment II prints the name of  myItem2.
Code segment I prints the price of  myItem,  but code segment II does not compile.
Code segment II prints the name of  myItem2,  but code segment I does not compile.
Nothing is printed because neither code segment compiles.

content.answer: Code segment II prints the name of  myItem2,  but code segment I does not compile.

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
